name: limesurvey
description: LimeSurvey is a professional survey platform that enables creating advanced questionnaires and collecting results. It supports branching logic, custom themes, and export formats, and can be deployed self-hosted or as SaaS.
features: Survey Creation: Advanced questionnaires, Question types, Branching logic. Build professional surveys.
Response Collection: Anonymous or tracked, Email invitations, Public links. Gather responses flexibly.
Data Analysis: Export formats, Statistics, Charts and graphs. Analyze survey results.
Custom Themes: Branding options, Custom CSS, Mobile-responsive. Match your organization's style.
